Music Library</h1>
<img alt="" src="http://eums.eusa.ed.ac.uk/wp-content/uploads/images/w620/library.jpg" width="620" height="250" />

Since our founding in 1867, we have collected a wide range of choral and instrumental music, including pieces written specifically for us by various composers. In 2012 EUMS transferred a large quantity of its collection to a number of other musical organisations on long-term loan; however, we still retain a large library of pieces, some unique.</p>

Hiring music from our library costs a nominal rate of £10/month per set in addition to postage, with the cost being invoiced at the end of the agreed hire period.</p>

As part of our aim to increase the ease of provision to younger musicians, student and youth music groups will not incur these hire costs</em> and would only pay for the postage of music.</p>

The full catalogue can be found by following this link</a>.</big></strong></p>

For further details of the music we have on offer, and to make enquiries with regards to the hire of a set of music, please contact our President at president@eums.org.uk</a>.</p>

The Edinburgh University Music Society and its committee retains the right to charge appropriate and necessary penalty fees for the damage or loss of any hired music.</small></p>
